metadata.title: CVE-2021-35474 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Stack-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability in cachekey plugin of ApacheTraffic Server. This issue affects Apache Traffic Server 7.0.0 to 7.1.12,8.0.0 to 8.1.1, 9.0.0 to 9.0.1.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
